issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Implement RecordReader
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4365](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4365). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
RecordReader reads logical records into memory, this is the prerequisite for ColumnReader
